Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max
Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question [1].
The type of max(-14, -1) is

Question [2].
The type of max(-1, 17.11463135286957200) is

Question [3]. 
max(-10, 8.16779118004134400) ==

Question [4]. 
max(15, ) == 21

Question [5]. 
max(-17.789178426483340800, ) == -17.789178426483340800
